TEXT.TITLE: RENOUF HAS 93.4 PCT OF BENEQUITY <BH> UNITS
TEXT.BODY: <Renouf Corp International> said it now owns 93.4 pct of Benequity Holdings a California Limited Partnership. Renouf said it has accepted for payment all 3,914,968 units of Benequity Holdings tendered in response to its 31 dlrs per unit offer. Along with the 1,449,550 units already held by Renouf, it now owns 93.4 pct of the 5,745,706 units outstanding. Reuter
